title: I like this better than safari… just missing a few features…
text: I almost never use safari now… only when i click on a link sent to me but that is automatic. The only things missing from the google app that would make it the perfect app for internet browsing are: 1) add a gesture similar to safari where you can just pinch in and see all your open tabs. 2) be able to swipe the tabs left to close them. 3) add a reader view, or something that can block ads/distractions. 4) add a “read later” option for articles in the discover feed.

title: What happened to the swipe? 😬
text: This is probably one of the top 3 most used apps in my phone. Definitely at least top 5. I love the ease of access to be able to google anything I want within a matter of seconds. HOWEVER ... why did this latest version get rid of the ability to swipe away stories you’re not interested in? I didn’t realize how much I used that feature until it was gone and I must say I miss it dearly. Please bring it back! I keep accidentally opening stories I’m not interested in because I keep forgetting I can’t swipe them away. Please bring back the swipe! It was so convenient 😩

title: Developer response please
text:
Love this app, have been using it for years. Super handy and I recommend it often. It’s literally top left on my Home Screen. Only posting the 1* to get eyes on this message. 

Lately (last couple months) I’ve been having an issue where the app freezes for 10-20 seconds in the middle of usage. During this time, scroll doesn’t work, I can’t click buttons, typing “registers” but doesn’t actually show up until it finishes the freeze. 

After some time passes, the app works again as usual. Any letters I had typed will rapidly enter into the form, I’ll teleport to where I scrolled, etc. While it happens life is on pause. It’s pretty disruptive because I often use the app for quick search (it’s on my Home Screen).

title: It keeps using my school account as my default account EVERY.. time😨
text:
and I’m so tired of it. It randomly switches me to my school account repeatedly , I no longer have privacy anymore, and this is a huge issue since my school can monitor what I look up. No matter how many times I’ve logged out, kept logging into and switching to my main, the same thing happens and I’m literally so tired. 
this seems to have been an issue for years and has tons of threads on Reddit for it , and why has nothing been done if you guys are billionaires.
just tried to switch to my main again since it went to my school account and as soon as I switched and tried to look something up it automatically went to my school account. This is a HUGE issue.

title: Tabs removed when I didn’t close them
text: The past few months my tabs on my iPad and iPhone have randomly closed when I don’t look at them for a few days. This wasn’t an issue until late 2021, probably I noticed it around September or October. If I need to go back to them I have to scroll through my history, sometimes a few  days or weeks of history , just to get to an address of a doctor or something I was keeping an eye on the price of. If not for the fairly reliable history tracking this would be a disaster. Pleas fix this! I know from other reviews I’m not the only one with that issue.

title: Very Good app!
text: I have had a lot of experience with Google, and I find it uncomplicated, and useful. I can easily type, and search what I would like, and images, locations, books, videos, etc. pop up, and I am able to find what I was looking for. You can use Google Lens, for homework, translating, and more! You can use the microphone feature, and easily find a song! Overall, the app is amazing! I do appreciate the effort your team puts into everything, and you are doing a great job! Keep up the great work!!

title: Image search: what the heck?!
text: As others have complained, the simple image search feature has been ruined with overly complicated and unnecessary tabs, and you have to actually open the site the photo is on to save. Also, Google thinks I’m stupid and autocorrects my search unsolicited even though I didn’t select the “did you mean X?” hyperlink. Finally, I don’t know if the search algorithm itself has changed, but the search results are now wildly unrelated to what I’m looking for. I searched for an obituary of an old classmate of mine who passed away recently (searched their name and obituary) but the search results were reports on school shootings (my friend died of a heart attack and never shot up a school, and his name didn’t match any school shooters’ names from the articles). Throw away the update and start over.

title: Moderately helpful, but EXTREMELY INAPPROPRIATE!!!
text: Google was very peachy, helping me research stuff, and things like that. I was going about my business, looking things up on google. Everything was good. UNTIL...I stumbled across something very inappropriate! After that, I noticed that inappropriate things of all sorts pop up, including pictures, websites, and words! Children, very young children use google! You should be ashamed that you allow this xxx stuff on your app! I don’t know how google works, but You should go through all the things submitted to google, and check if they’re appropriate enough. You are disgustingly inappropriate and I feel extremely sorry for the kids and teens that use this site, and are exposed to that stuff. Please do something.

title: Bias of information
text: As much as I enjoyed being able to look up things on Google I have been very displeased by their bias by omission. Buy simply not offering some factual things that are happening in the world — they leave those who are interested in finding out the truth with only part of the equation. When it comes to connecting the dots it is irksome to find that many of the dots have been purposely removed so that the person looking at the picture trying to connect the dots — will not be able to come near finding what the truth actually is.

title: A Recurring Issue
text:
The app itself is fine. A few bugs here and there, but nothing they don’t fix within a reasonable time frame.

There is, however, an issue I’ve had to deal with time and time again for years since I’ve been using the app across multiple devices. When viewing images, the related images section beneath the selected image will show only the first few results of the original search and nothing else. Every image in the search does this and every image in the related images section yields the same result when selected. I’ve never seen ways to fix this.

title: Google tinamoses
text: I am a 54 yr old grandma if 2 beautiful granddaughter s 1 handsome grandsons I’m not well educated I have a short turn memory ADHD ADDand I have turittiets syndrome I just learn a lot about my google experience it has really become my favorite app it has thought me things like google map took me place I never knew I could go I appreciate and apsilutly love all about my google maps drive also google helps me to fine information of places number helps with my whether report I have COPD and asmatic broncitus love google it takes care of all my need s thank google ur the greatest

title: Google for iPhones but not Mac computers
text: I would have given 5 stars because of the efficiency in using all Google apps on my iPhone but there is no Google app for computers such as Macs. This is where Google is in need of improving. I absolutely love Google Scholar, Docs, calendars and maps in my professional career and education, need help being able to bounce from my iPhone to my Mac computer. It would be interesting to know how many people are Gmail and Google users who use Macs for personal, educational and work as we are all encountering this problem from reports on the internet.

title: Google
text:
To Whom this may concern, just a short text to say that Google is the best thing to ever happen to me. Google is my lifeline. It has the answer to all my questions. A great help in all my studies. Even my Bible Studies. Google saves me many trips to the library when it comes to research. It’s a School and College all by itself. Thank you so much for the Google apps, I could not make it with the Google Apps. Keep up with the knowledge especially for the Seniors, many of whom never had the opportunity to go to school. Again I say Thank you. 
                                                     Beverly Allen

title: Jaguar Land Rover Darien
text:
My initial dealings and subsequent relationship with Jaguar Darien have been much superior to those I’ve had with other dealerships (of this and other car companies) in Fairfield County. The gentleman I have worked with, Allen Johnson, has shown a high level of expertise and has developed a solid relationship with both myself and my wife. This applies not only to the purchase of our Jaguar but to his attentive follow up regarding our car and questions and concerns about future developments with Jaguar in this constantly evolving automotive environment. John Black Westport, CT

JSBLACKIII 
Westport, CT

title: Performance 5 star 🌟 and more if I could give them 👍
text:
Vivie and Nick thank you thank you!

Vivie thank you so much for explaining  my bill it was getting really frustrating to understand why the bill kept going up and up! I will work on my husband on paper less bills Poor Trees! You are an asset to Verizon and their customers.  I wish we would have come to this location from the beginning of our experience in upgrading to new phone’s and iPads.  From now on this is the store we will really on !👍😄

title: Mine owner
text: Fort drum crystal mine in  okeechobee county Florida  I was thinking about getting an attorney the woman on the phone was very helpful  and compassionate I have the only crystal mine in our state don’t have a. huge bissnese but peaple count on me I was haveing serious problems with out of control local government and a. Utility company I was up against the wall with no real answers in sight and was put at ease and told they would be able to help me get back to normal thanks guys Eddie rucks I own the fort drum crystal mine in okeechobee and have for25 years now they really came to my rescue

title: Keyboard typing lag while using search bar
text: I don’t know if anyone else has this issue, but my iPhone 8 running iOS 13 is lagging while typing in the search bar. Only happens when using this Google app, no other apps have this issue. Not entirely conclusive as to whether it’s my iOS or the app, since my app was updated almost in conjunction with my iOS 13. However, it’s still very frustrating considering how fluid typing used to be before the recent revision to the app’s interface. Even the Google suggestions aren’t loading as fast as they’re supposed to. Altogether, pretty disappointing. Usually this app is pretty solid and concise. Not anymore, evidently.

title: Bad New Update
text:
Edit - they put the “more stories” button back, but now it’s harder to edit interests and the stories are much less tailored to me. Hide this story is helpful but I feel like it was still better a few updates back. At least now it’s heading in the right direction. 

Original review - The most recent update is awful. I used to love that I could click more and get a ton of news stories tailored to my interested. The option to click more is gone and now I get maybe 10 stories. Fairly useless to me now.. will switch over to Apple News until this is put back.

title: All about Google because Google is the best best best best best best
text: Google is the best I love you so much google is my best friend google is my best friend Google is my best friend Google Google Google Google Google when I download it I was like why did I download that I downloaded by accident but I love it Google Google Google Google and it downloads very quick I literally just downloaded it 10 minutes ago wait five minutes ago it literally is the best the best thing ever I can scream I love it so much oh my God google made my life easier I love it the end

title: I like it but...
text: I really like google! It helps me search things I need, and what I need to know. There’s some problems though. On google, you can basically search ANYTHING. And that’s a BIG problem. It’s ok to search things like, what is an adverb, but kids can just search anything!!! Some kids just like to search things that are not for them. And that’s just horrible. Some kids just don’t ask permission to search something, and that could affect there LIFE. I like google, but children just must be safe using it.

title: Fantastic typically
text: The app typically functions flawlessly but I am now having an issue with crashing. I open the app on my iPhone 11 running IOS 13.5 Beta 3 (Build: 17F5054h) and after less than a minute of the app being open the app crashes. Now this by no means is a complaint just a bug that I would like to be known so it can get taken care of at some point. I understand that running beta software comes with issues like this so it would be completely idiotic give me to be angry. I hope this helps the bug get taken care of. 👍🏼

title: Sister app?
text:
Could you make an app where you can open it up and search the internet for anything or to ask for an answer to a question? 

Right now when I have a question I open Google to search for an answer but before I can do that there’s a tab that looks like it might be interesting, then I think well lets scroll down and see if anything else is something I need to know about? Then I think, wait I was here for a reason, I wanted to find out something specific. What was it? I can’t remember. I guess I’ll just shut down the app then. 

I understand this was what the app was designed for and it is very good at that but sometimes it’s what I don’t like about it. Other times I go on Google just to see what other people have discovered or are writing about but sometimes they are a distraction from what I am really curious about. 

I would like it if you made a search engine that is dedicated to searches and not a distraction from my curiosity. 

Thank you for your time.

title: New Updates = Unavailable Webpage
text: Not sure what (or why) y’all decided to butcher the app but around 80% of the time I search for something on my iPhone 11, I get the ‘webpage is not available’ message. Please get moving on fixing this issue because it’s been going on for at least a week now. Other Google apps seem to be working fine but the most important one that the company’s foundation was built on should be working first and foremost. I tried to uninstall and reinstall; nothing. I tried to disconnect from Wi-Fi and search; nothing. Ironically, I can’t even Google how to fix this issue. Get it straightened out, G-men. Thanks.

title: Too annoying and slow.
text: The app takes too long to load up and takes about two minutes to actually start and even then it is slow. Google takes way too long to respond and they need to do something about the response time for this app since it is in 1# utilities. They do not let me somehow turn off the seven day feature when the app takes off previous tabs that you have not visited in seven days which I think you should be able to take off. Although I hate this app I still need the internet so I give this app three stars for its services. Thank you Google team.

title: Recommend
text:
I mean it’s a pretty good app, it’s just that the search feature isn’t helpful!  It just bases the results of the color or pattern or whatever.   There are also inappropriate results sometimes.  If you search up things it’ll probably give you the answer you’re looking for.  But I really hope there will be a feature where you can search up things without internet.  Maybe you can add more google doodles/games.  Overall, it it better than a lot of searching apps.  It’s a pretty good one!  Really recommend it!  😁

XOXO,
frogXturtle 🐸🐢

title: Too many bugs
text: Since the last update, typing is a nightmare with ridiculous lag times. In addition I see the same stories over and over agin in my newsfeed even those I’ve told Google not to show me anymore. And finally, every other time I use the app, there seems to be a loading issue and I only get a check back later message. This used to be a very good  app and my go to for searching and reading the news. Now webpages won’t load and the newsfeed has become pointless. It either doesn’t load stories or gives me the same stories it’s been giving me for months. It used to be the place I went to for any basic internet search but no longer. I’ll stick with searching via a Mobile browser and rely on Apple News for my newsfeed.

title: Love the app, just one glaring issue
text: So I’ve been using this app for about 2 years, and I consider it night and day with safari, a better option for me. Well integrated and very intuitive. My only issue with the app is that recently, I’ve been using the large widget. Whenever I hit the search button, it takes about 11 seconds for any of my initial    touch-strokes to register. If I leave the app and reenter the same issue applies. If I turn off my phone and reenter the same happens. Please fix! Otherwise, the new integrations are great and match my style!

title: Horrible fix IMMEDIATELY
text: If ur a business man and u hav multiple accounts good luck cuz google don’t care and they restrict u from using your number from having as many accounts that u need for work. Coming from me that I need for work and business and for needing for helping newcomers to my job I can’t even after trying to create 1 new email it says (phone number has been used to many times) and there is no way to fix this so after 10 accounts they say which it’s a lie cuz I don’t hav 10 accounts they lock your phone number from ever making new Gmails EVER and basically u hav to use a WHOLE new number and it’s like I don’t hav another number or landline and I’m not gonna use my friends number for my business plz fix this pathetic BS😡🤬

title: Midway rules!!!!🤪🤪🤪🤪🎶
text: My wife, Cindy and I have been buying Nissans from Midway for many many years, we just purchased a new 2022 Nissan Altima, SL, and like always, they treat us like royalty. Emily, the customer service manager, was absolutely awesome. Terry in  Finance was not pushy, he was very thorough, and took care of us on warranty and kept our payment where we wanted it to be. New car manager, Julio, was very professional along with Golda took very good care of us, and they did it in a timely fashion. I recommend Midway Nissan highly, they are definitely the best in Phoenix.

title: I'm very annoyed.
text: Usually, when i try to click the app, Google, it glitches me out. It Shows a black screen, furthermore my home screen. Please fix this! I've been having a problem with this a lot, i've been having to re-download and shut down my device more then 3 times. This has happened on my other device, (iPad). It has done the same thing. I am also writing this because whenever i click something it brings me to the link it's from! I just want to see the photo, following another problem; not letting me save photos! It usually says "cannot save" so I have to screenshot. Google, please fix this! Thank you for your time. 🙂❤️

title: Missing Searches
text: I love this app. I use it multiple times every single day. My only complaint, and I’m not sure if I’m the only one, but when I tap on the search bar to start typing, I no longer have my last searches show up as a list under the search bar. That’s really unfortunate because I’d use that all the time to quickly go back to a previous search. Google, if this was removed, please put it back!! Everything else is amazing with the app, but the loss of that is very frustrating. Thank you for what you do!

title: Usually love but freezes too much lately
text: I love Google so much I have both the Google app and the chrome app. I love the Google one because it has a quick search bar and all of my news, agenda etc. But lately it will freeze after a search. I can't go back, refresh, retype. Nothing. My only option is to close the app and do it again after every search. So lately I've been using the chrome app much more. It's super annoying because although I love chrome, I like how fast a search can be made on the Google app and I can't do that currently. I've looked for updates and updated my phone and still havening the same problem. Please fix it!

title: Won’t use anymore. HATE the front page.
text:
EDIT: changed my review because now you can turn off the feed of suggestions!

THANK YOU GOOGLE!

The reason I loved google on desktop and mobile was because how simple the site was. No nonsense, just a search bar. I didn’t have to look at any part of the internet I didn’t want to see.

I’ve had to stop using because it is spoiling all my favorite tv shows for me. If I open the app before I’ve seen an episode of something, it’s spoiled immediately because the app uses my interests to put relevant articles below the search bar.

Also sometimes I need a break from all the upsetting things that go on and I never know what I’m going to see when I open google. It gives me anxiety!

I’ve tried to delete these subjects and they only come back with time.

Such a silly reason to not use an app, but I can just use my browser to search, that’s what’s happened.

title: The best way how to answer your questions!
text: Google is the best way how to search up something that your curiosity wants to wonder and the funny thing about Google is that there is secrets in it and if you search up do a barrel roll it will actually do it and it’s really really funny it made my day when I searched it up and I consider for you doing that it’s so funny no kidding anyway there is some false answers about NASA it put like the earth is round but I love this app in my opinion you really should download thus

title: Great meal
text: Tonight I decided I needed red meat so called Outback in Glendale, AZ.  This is not usually my go to place because it is rather pricey for my budget.  Carry out waitress Natalie helped me decide on what steak would be best and I ordered the 9 oz filet, a baked potato and French Onion Soup.  Every bite of my meal was impeccable, seasoned and cooked to perfection. I called Manager Ted and he told me Fayla was the chef tonight and expressed that he should be proud of his team.  I ate every bite!  Now I know where to go to get a great steak.  My chi-Weinstein loved what little I would share too.  Delicious.  Hats off.  Standing ovation

title: NEW UI
text:
Just so we level set, everything that we’re expressing in the reviews are first world problems and in the grand scheme of things none if it really matters. but since we’re here …. 

I actually like the new UI that was implemented with the search bar, being round and a little bit larger, and I understand that it may not be for everyone, but I think the aesthetic is very pleasing. 

It was a nice surprise to align with iOS16 + dynamic island vibes. 

I will, however, express that I do not like there is no option to remove some of the features directly below the search bar. some of those features are not useful to everyone and it would be ideal if we could pick and choose which ones we would like to have under the search bar if this is going to be a permanent implementation.  

Example: I don’t see to see the option of search homework, but I do like the option for search song.

title: Devs are completely ignoring reviews
text: The app has fallen apart. People are reporting very similar issues, and haven't even got a reply stating that the issue is being looked into. I guess once you get to a certain level consumer issues don't matter, but what does matter is the numbers. The issue with the app is that it will not load new content, and when it does it is content you have already seen, or content from two months ago that is no longer relevant to the user. Google and Apple have both completely forgotten about the having a quality product. Each and every day the more users they get the less they see them as people, and the more they see them as numbers. Resolve the common issues before making the product "better"

title: No way to get help!
text: When I got IPhone 15  issues with you tube began.  Can’t remember password, must sign in to get. Match the number on you tube only you tube app only showing videos. An acct I forgot I had from 2007 was brought up where I was allowed to change PW but could not delete, could not retrieve my & subscriptions library;finally told to try later, too many attempts. Tried to look for number to call, could not find.  Went to chat, said can not sign up on You tube app. Told to use fewer words, . Typed “Password Help”. Again told to try fewer words! Trying to delete & start over; having issues.  Now I am 72 years old, pretty good on computers but  I need some help.  I really would like to use a cuss word but I won’t!

title: Please Stop Refreshing!
text: I used to really like the app to read news and blogs about my favorite topics. Something changed in a recent update that causes my feed or an article I have open to refresh when I switch between apps. I’d understand if I hadn’t had the app open in a while, but this can happen in as little as 30 seconds between apps. It’s very frustrating to have a news article open, get a phone call, and then come back to the Google app and the content is gone because the app refreshed. I know there’s a tab option, but the content doesn’t always save there.

title: Pictures
text:
This new update is terrible. Previous versions, if I cut and paste a link, or did a search, it would remember it until I deleted it manually.  Now, it doesn’t retain anything.  AND, it is nearly impossible to trigger the web address to be copied, as I have to drag it and place it back on the url bar in order to be able to manipulate it, which then allows me to select all.  I used to just have to click on the address bar anywhere, and it gave the copy option.

Also, pasting is a pain too.  Now I have to hold my finger there for several seconds after a double tap in order to paste.  Which it no longer remembers the address when I leave.

Please fix this for the iPhone.

title: Good
text: My go to search engine. It pulls up articles from everywhere so I know I’m getting information from multiple different places, not just one, and that they are easy-to-navigate. There are some things I don’t like, for instance, when you search not all the websites that are listed are relevant to what you’re searching. Also, the websites sometimes don’t answer your question or give you the information you need. For the most part though, Google is an extremely good source and I recommend it. I don’t have a lot of problems with it and its pretty simple to navigate.

title: App crashing constantly after latest update
text:
UPDATE: There was an update to the app a few hours after I submitted this review that solved the problem! And I received an email letting me know the issue was fixed!  Excellent customer service!  

I updated the app on my iPhone yesterday and tried using it today. It froze the first time I opened it so I closed the app. It crashed immediately the next 6-12 times I tried opening it. Never had this problem before this update.

title: I get spam phone calls every time I stay in app
text: I’ve always used Google app as my primary search engine but starting last year just before elections, every time I opened the app and stayed in it for more than 5 mins immediately after I closed the app I’d receive a phone call (and texts I can’t block) from unidentifiable numbers. Just recently at 7AM on a Saturday morning! I barely ever use the phone part and my contacts are kept at a minimum. This is a huge security breach and has made me wary that my searches or movements within Google apps have been tracked by unknown parties. I won’t be using Google apps as much anymore till I find another search engine app that doesn’t sell out my information.

title: Not impressed
text:
Since becoming aware of this app my gmail will refuse to open anything in Chrome (defaults to Safari even though Chrome is set at the default in the app and on my phone settings). 
The suggested reading simply provides spoilers to shows I’m watching, or suggests articles that it knows I’ve already read. 
Additionally, the “people also viewed” suggestion that shows up at the bottom of my screen is horrible. It takes up so much reading space and essentially acts as an extension of the ads already on my screen. The bouncing it causes on my screen provides a horrible user experience. 
I’m giving it one star because I don’t prefer it over safari and am frustrated that it interferes with my use of Chrome (which by far is my app of choice).

title: There are gory videos and images of CARTOONS!!! Remove them ALL please, Google
text:
Cartoons nowadays are targeted to KIDS! Users disrespect cartoons by creating gory images and videos of them! Google, this is getting ridiculous. Please remove all the gory images and videos and websites of cartoons OFF of your search results! I looked up Looney Tunes stuff and I saw a gory video and some gory images! Please remove them all from your app and the website! I’m disgusted, sad and scared at the same time! SafeSearch doesn’t work for NOTHING! It doesn’t filter gory images and videos! You have lost a website and app visitor! Here’s what I feel rn: 🤭😨😢🤢😱

Do something please, Google! I’m desperate for this to go away! Please don’t ruin our childhood! PLEASE HELP US ALL! PLEASE!!!😭😢🥺 Since this wasn’t resolved, I am no longer trusting Google. Shameful.

title: Great, but...
text:
This app is nice but when you type half the word I get something very inappropriate. Then I start dozing off and accidentally press it, and I literally see disgusting images. WHY YOU PUT THIS ON THE INTERNET???!!!! 
Please keep privacy to the people, in the photos, and also delete these!

I know in your terms of services you are not liable to the content, but who knows, this content can snap a child’s brain
Remove those uncovered photos permanently! 
And also, remove the word to because someone small can find and see these!

YOU guys should make a SEPARATE APP called: GOOGLE FOR KIDS, which only shows content that is age- appropriate. Now kids can’t see these photos anymore with google kids!

Also by the way, I don’t know if I am in trouble or not.

I am sorry if I am bothering you.

Anyways this is a nice app

title: Bring back the old image format!
text: I never leave reviews but now I will. I used the google app specifically so I wouldn’t have to deal with the image format that google had when I chose to google something through Safari on iPhone, now the google app has the same layout/format as when using Safari, I used the google app cause it seemed more convenient and I was able to be very quick with it, now it’s not worth having the app, does nothing for me when I can just open safari, which now all together isn’t even worth using google at all anymore, for my research. Or at least just for images, and as I can tell by the recent reviews, I’m not the only one unhappy with this! At least somehow make it an option or setting to have it the old way.

title: Information  Central...
text:
Google has been a fascinating source of information for me. It makes no difference who, what, when or where you are searching to fill in the blanks the answer is always there. Being a woman of age I marvel at this opportunity to tap into this endless knowledge. It has been life saving to me being of health that has kept me housebound as of late...As a child I was told,” it isn’t important how much you know. What matters is knowing how to find out what you need to know!”
I have found this to be true and now it’s at my fingertips!
